content.json:
This workbook provides drill-down dashboards to aid the execution of threat hunts targeting Sysmon data mapped to MITRE ATT&CK.

This workbook is written by [Edoardo Gerosa](https://twitter.com/netevert).
For guidance consult [Sentinel ATT&CK's documentation](https://github.com/BlueTeamToolkit/sentinel-attack) or contact [the author](https://twitter.com/netevert). For bug submissions please [open an issue](https://github.com/BlueTeamToolkit/sentinel-attack/issues) on GitHub.

This tab provides an overview of ATT&CK triggers within a selected time range. Edit the `Time Range` and `Time Interval` below to select a time range and interval. Please note that all tables below report data for non-whitelisted Sysmon events. Consult [this documentation](https://github.com/BlueTeamLabs/sentinel-attack/wiki/Trigger-overview-tab) for additional information.

parameters.name: Time_Interval
parameters.label: Time Interval
parameters.query:
datatable(key:string, value:string)
[
"1m", "1 minute",
"5m", "5 minutes",
"15m", "15 minutes",
"30m", "30 minutes",
"1h", "1 hour"
]

content.title: Top triggered techniques within selected time range
Top triggered Computers within selected time range
Overview of ATT&CK tactics triggered over time range by selected time interval

content.json: The tab provides insights into all ATT&CK triggers registered within the selected timespan. More importantly the data in this tab helps to drill down into Sysmon logs by filtering by ATT&CK tactics, techniques, technique ID and excluded hosts. Consult [this documentation](https://github.com/BlueTeamLabs/sentinel-attack/wiki/ATT&CK-drilldown-tab) for additional information.

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.label: Timespan
parameters.description: Selects the time range for the drilldown

parameters.name: tactic
parameters.label: ATT&CK tactic
parameters.description: The ATT&CK tactic to target during the drilldown analysis
parameters.query:
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(phase_name)
| summarize by phase_name

parameters.name: technique
parameters.label: ATT&CK technique
parameters.description: The ATT&CK technique to target during the drilldown analysis
parameters.query:
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(technique_name)
| summarize by technique_name

parameters.name: technique_id_value
parameters.label: ATT&CK technique ID
parameters.description: The ATT&CK technique ID to target during the drilldown analysis
parameters.query:
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(technique_id)
| summarize by technique_id

parameters.name: excluded_host
parameters.label: Exclude host
parameters.description: The hosts to exclude during the drilldown analysis

content.title: Process create (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No process create events matching ATT&CK techniques for given timespan and host

content.query:
let process_path_whitelist = process_access_whitelist | project process_path;
let target_process_path_whitelist = process_access_whitelist | project target_process_path;
let process_granted_access_whitelist = process_access_whitelist | project process_granted_access;
Sysmon 
| where EventID == 10
| where isnotempty(technique_name)
| where phase_name in ({tactic})
| where technique_name in ({technique})
| where technique_id in ({technique_id_value})
| where Computer !in ({excluded_host})
| where process_path !in~ (process_path_whitelist) and target_process_path !in~ (target_process_path_whitelist) and process_granted_access !in~ (process_granted_access_whitelist)
| project TimeGenerated, technique_id, technique_name, phase_name, Computer, process_path, target_process_path, process_granted_access, target_process_guid, process_id, target_process_id
content.title: Process access (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No process access events matching ATT&CK techniques for given timespan and host

content.query:
let file_name_whitelist = file_create_whitelist | project file_name;
let file_path_whitelist = file_create_whitelist | project file_path;
let proc_path_whitelist = file_create_whitelist | project process_path;
Sysmon 
| where EventID == 11
| where isnotempty(technique_name)
| where phase_name in ({tactic})
| where technique_name in ({technique})
| where technique_id in ({technique_id_value})
| where Computer !in ({excluded_host})
| where process_path !in~ (proc_path_whitelist) and file_name !in~ (file_name_whitelist)
| project TimeGenerated, technique_id, technique_name, phase_name, Computer, process_path, file_name, process_guid, process_id
content.title: File created (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No file created events matching ATT&CK techniques for given timespan and host

content.title: Image loaded (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No image loaded events matching ATT&CK techniques for given timespan and host

content.title: Network connection (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No network connection events matching ATT&CK techniques for given timespan and host

content.query:
let event_type_whitelist = registry_whitelist | project event_type;
let process_path_whitelist = registry_whitelist | project process_path;
let registry_key_path_whitelist = registry_whitelist | project registry_key_path;
Sysmon 
| where EventID == 12
| where isnotempty(technique_name)
| where phase_name in ({tactic})
| where technique_name in ({technique})
| where technique_id in ({technique_id_value})
| where Computer !in ({excluded_host})
| where process_path !in~ (process_path_whitelist) and EventType !in~ (event_type_whitelist) and registry_key_path !in~ (registry_key_path_whitelist)
| project TimeGenerated, technique_id, technique_name, phase_name, EventType, Computer, process_path, process_id, process_guid, registry_key_path
content.title: Registry access (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No registry access events matching ATT&CK techniques for given timespan and host

content.query:
let process_path_whitelist = pipe_whitelist | project process_path;
let pipe_name_whitelist = pipe_whitelist | project pipe_name;
Sysmon 
| where EventID == 17 or EventID == 18
| where isnotempty(technique_name)
| where phase_name in ({tactic})
| where technique_name in ({technique})
| where technique_id in ({technique_id_value})
| where Computer !in ({excluded_host})
| where process_path !in~ (process_path_whitelist) and pipe_name !in~ (pipe_name_whitelist)
| project TimeGenerated, technique_id, technique_name, phase_name, Computer, pipe_name, process_path, process_guid, process_id
content.title: Pipes (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No pipe created or connected events matching ATT&CK techniques for given timespan and host

content.query:
let host_whitelist = dns_whitelist | project host;
let process_whitelist = dns_whitelist | project process_path;
let query_whitelist = dns_whitelist | project query_name;
Sysmon 
| where EventID == 22
| where isnotempty(technique_name)
| where phase_name in ({tactic})
| where technique_name in ({technique})
| where technique_id in ({technique_id_value})
| where Computer !in ({excluded_host})
| where Computer !in~ (host_whitelist) or process_path !in~ (process_whitelist) or dns_query_name !in~ (query_whitelist)
| project TimeGenerated, technique_id, technique_name, phase_name, Computer, process_path, dns_query_name, dns_query_status, dns_query_results, process_guid
content.title: DNS (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No DNS events matching ATT&CK techniques for given timespan and host

content.json:
This tab provides insights into all user activity logged within the specified timespan. The data covered in this tab isn't limited just to Sysmon logs generated by the selected user but also takes into account Windows Security Log Events to highlight suspicious user activity. Consult [this documentation](https://github.com/BlueTeamLabs/sentinel-attack/wiki/User-drilldown-tab) for additional information.

**Note:** All data in this workbook excludes whitelisted events.

parameters.name: time_span
parameters.label: Timespan
parameters.description: Selects time range of the drilldown

parameters.name: user_name_value
parameters.label: User name
parameters.description: Selects the username to target during drilldown
parameters.query:
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(technique_name)
| summarize by UserName

content.title: User activity by technique
User activity by host

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where (EventID == 4771 and FailureReason != 0x19) or EventID == 4625
| where Account contains split(@"{user_name_value}", @"\")[1]
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
content.title: Authentication Failures over time

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where (EventID == 4771 and FailureReason != 0x19) or EventID == 4624
| summarize count() by Account, Computer
| project Account, Computer
content.title: Authentication failures by user and host

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4624
| summarize count() by Account, Computer, LogonType
| project Account, Computer, LogonType
content.title: Authentication success by user and host

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4720
content.title: EventID 4720 - SA Accounts are excluded

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4722
content.title: EventID 4722 - SA and Computer Accounts are excluded

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4726
content.title: EventID 4726 - SA and Computer Accounts are excluded

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where (EventID==4720 or EventID==4738 or EventID==4728 or EventID==4732 or EventID==4746 or EventID==4751 or EventID==4756 or EventID==4761)
content.title: Accounts Created or Changed and Added to Group

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where (EventID==4738 or EventID==4729 or EventID==4733 or EventID==4747 or EventID==4752 or EventID==4756 or EventID==4762) and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Changed and Removed from Group(s)

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4740 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Locked Out

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4767 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Unlocked

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4725 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Disabled

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4781 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Renamed

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4723 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Accounts Password Changed by user

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4724 and Account contains @"{user_name_value}"
content.title: Account Password Change by administrator
Process Create
Process Access
File Created
Image Loaded
Network Connection
Create Remote Thread
content.noDataMessage: No create remote thread events for selected time generated

content.title: Registry Access
Pipes
content.noDataMessage: No pipe create and connect events for selected time and user

content.json: This tab provides an overview of all triggers observed for the selected virtual machine (host) within the specified timespan. Consult [this documentation](https://github.com/BlueTeamLabs/sentinel-attack/wiki/Computer-drilldown-tab) for additional information.

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.label: Timespan
parameters.description: Selects the time range for the drilldown

parameters.name: host
parameters.label: Host
parameters.description: Selects the target host for the drilldown analysis

content.title: Activity by technique
Process create (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No process create activity matching ATT&CK techniques for host

content.title: Process access  (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No process access activity matching ATT&CK techniques for host

content.title: File created  (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No file create activity matching ATT&CK techniques for host

content.title: Image loaded  (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No image loaded activity matching ATT&CK techniques for host

content.title: Network connections  (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No network connection activity matching ATT&CK techniques for host

content.title: Registry access (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No registry access activity matching ATT&CK techniques  for host

content.query:
let process_path_whitelist = pipe_whitelist | project process_path;
let pipe_name_whitelist = pipe_whitelist | project pipe_name;
Sysmon
| where EventID == 17
| where Computer contains "{host}"
| where isnotempty(technique_name)
| where process_path !in~ (process_path_whitelist) and pipe_name !in~ (pipe_name_whitelist)
| project TimeGenerated, technique_id, technique_name, phase_name, Computer, pipe_name, process_path, process_guid, process_id
content.title: Pipes (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No pipe create and connect activity matching ATT&CK techniques for host

content.title: DNS queries (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No DNS activity matching ATT&CK techniques for host

content.query:
Event
| where Source contains "sysmon"
| where Computer contains "{host}"
| extend RenderedDescription = tostring(split(RenderedDescription, ":")[0])
| project TimeGenerated, EventID, RenderedDescription, Computer, UserName, Data=parse_xml(EventData).DataItem.EventData.Data
content.title: Raw sysmon logs

content.json:
This tab provides insights into all indicators related to the specified process GUID within the specified timespan. Consult [this documentation](https://github.com/BlueTeamLabs/sentinel-attack/wiki/Process-GUID-drilldown-tab) for additional information.

**Note:** All data in this tab excludes whitelisted events.

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.label: Time span
parameters.description: Selects the time range for the drilldown

parameters.name: process_guid_selection
parameters.label: Process guid
parameters.query:
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(process_guid)
| summarize count() by tostring(process_guid)
| project process_guid

parameters.name: process
parameters.label: Process parent path
parameters.query:
Sysmon
| where EventID == 1
| where process_guid == "{process_guid_selection}"
| project strcat(process_parent_id, "-", process_parent_path)

content.title: Overview of Sysmon process GUIDs
Overview of Sysmon process GUIDs by ATT&CK techniques triggered

content.query:
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(process_guid)
| where process_guid == "{process_guid_selection}"
| project TimeGenerated, EventID, RenderedDescription, process_guid, process_path, process_parent_path
content.title: Drilldown for selected GUID

content.query:
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(process_parent_path)
| where process_parent_path == tostring(split(@"{process}", "-")[1])
| where isnotempty(process_path)
| summarize c=count() by tostring(process_path), tostring(process_id)
| sort by c desc
content.title: Overview of spawned  child processes by selected process parent
Process create
Process access
content.noDataMessage: No process access activity found for this GUID

content.title: File create
content.noDataMessage: No file create activity for selected GUID

content.title: Image loaded
content.noDataMessage: No image loaded activity for selected GUID

content.title: Network connection
content.noDataMessage: No network connection activity for selected GUID

content.title: Registry access
content.noDataMessage: No registry access activity found for selected GUID

content.query:
let host_whitelist = dns_whitelist
| project host;
let process_whitelist = dns_whitelist
| project process_path;
let query_whitelist = dns_whitelist
| project query_name;
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(process_guid)
| where process_guid == "{process_guid_selection}"
| where EventID == 22
| where process_path !in~ (process_whitelist) and dns_query_name !in~ (query_whitelist)
| project TimeGenerated, dns_query_name, dns_query_status, dns_query_results, process_path, Computer
content.title: DNS requests
content.noDataMessage: No DNS request activity for selected GUID

content.json:
This tab provides insights into Sysmon network connection (Event ID 3) indicators within the specified timespan. Consult [this documentation](https://github.com/BlueTeamLabs/sentinel-attack/wiki/Network-connection-drilldown-tab) for additional information.

**Note:** With the exception of the "Raw Sysmon network connection logs" table all data in this tab excludes whitelisted network connection activity.

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.label: Time span
parameters.description: Selects the timerange for the drilldown

content.query:
let src_ip_whitelist = network_whitelist | project src_ip;
let dst_ip_whitelist = network_whitelist | project dst_ip;
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(src_ip) and isnotempty(dst_ip)
| where src_ip !in~ (src_ip_whitelist) and dst_ip !in~ (dst_ip_whitelist)
| summarize c=count() by tostring(src_ip), tostring(dst_ip)
| sort by c desc
content.noDataMessage: No network connection events for selected time span

content.query:
let src_ip_whitelist = network_whitelist | project src_ip;
let dst_ip_whitelist = network_whitelist | project dst_ip;
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(src_ip) and isnotempty(dst_ip)
| where src_ip !in~ (src_ip_whitelist) and dst_ip !in~ (dst_ip_whitelist)
| summarize c=count() by tostring(src_ip), tostring(dst_ip)
| sort by c desc
| project dst_ip, src_ip, c
content.noDataMessage: No network connection events for selected time span

content.query:
let src_ip_whitelist = network_whitelist | project src_ip;
Sysmon
| where isnotempty(src_ip) and isnotempty(dst_ip)
| where src_ip !in~ (src_ip_whitelist)
| summarize count() by tostring(dst_ip), bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: Activity by destination IP (excludes whitelisted source IPs)
content.noDataMessage: No network connection events for selected time span
No network connection events for selected time span

content.query:
Event
| where Source contains "sysmon"
| where TimeGenerated {time_range:query}
| where EventID == 3
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, UserName, Data=parse_xml(EventData).DataItem.EventData.Data
content.title: Raw Sysmon network connection logs

content.json: This tab provides an overview of all Sysmon file create (Event ID 11) indicators within the specified timespan. Consult [this documentation](https://github.com/BlueTeamLabs/sentinel-attack/wiki/File-create-drilldown-tab) for additional information.

content.title: Overview of file create events (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No file create events for selected time frame

content.query:
let file_name_whitelist = file_create_whitelist | project file_name;
let proc_path_whitelist = file_create_whitelist | project process_path;
Sysmon
| where EventID == 11
| where process_path !in~ (proc_path_whitelist) and file_name !in~ (file_name_whitelist)
| summarize c=count() by tostring(process_path), tostring(file_name)
| project process_path, file_name, c
| sort by c desc
content.title: Overview of file creates by process (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No file create events during selected time frame

parameters.name: process_path_selection
parameters.label: Process path
parameters.description: The process path to inspect for file create activity (excluding whitelisted process paths)

content.query:
let file_name_whitelist = file_create_whitelist | project file_name;
let proc_path_whitelist = file_create_whitelist | project process_path;
Sysmon
| where EventID == 11
| where isnotempty(technique_name)
| where process_path !in~ (proc_path_whitelist) and file_name !in~ (file_name_whitelist)
| project TimeGenerated, technique_id, technique_name, phase_name, Computer, UserName, process_path, file_name, process_guid
content.title: File create activity by ATT&CK technique (not whitelisted)
content.noDataMessage: No file create activity matching ATT&CK techniques during selected timeframe

content.query:
Sysmon
| where EventID == 11
| where tostring(process_path) == @"{process_path_selection}"
| summarize c=count() by tostring(file_name), bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| sort by c desc
content.title: File create activity by process

content.query:
Event
| where Source contains "sysmon"
| where EventID == 11
| extend RenderedDescription = tostring(split(RenderedDescription, ":")[0])
| project TimeGenerated, EventID, RenderedDescription, Computer, UserName, Data=parse_xml(EventData).DataItem.EventData.Data
content.title: Raw Sysmon File Create  logs

content.json:
This tab provides insights into Sysmon pipe create and connect (Event ID 17 and 18) indicators within the specified timespan. Consult [this documentation](https://github.com/BlueTeamLabs/sentinel-attack/wiki/Pipe-name-drilldown-tab) for additional informatio.

**Note:** With the exception of the "Raw events" table all data in this tab excludes whitelisted pipe created and connected events.

parameters.name: time_range
parameters.label: Time generated
parameters.description: Selects the time range for the drilldown

content.title: Pipe Create events
content.noDataMessage: No pipe create events for selected time generated

content.query:
let process_path_whitelist = pipe_whitelist | project process_path;
let pipe_name_whitelist = pipe_whitelist | project pipe_name;
Sysmon
| where EventID == 17 or EventID == 18
| where process_path !in~ (process_path_whitelist) and pipe_name !in~ (pipe_name_whitelist)
| summarize c=count() by tostring(process_path), tostring(pipe_name)
| project process_path, pipe_name, c
| sort by c desc
content.title: Pipe Create and Connect events
content.noDataMessage: No pipe create and connect events for selected time generated

content.title: Activity by Pipe Connects
content.noDataMessage: Unable to generate visualisation - insufficient data points

content.title: Pipe Connects
content.noDataMessage: No pipe connect events for selected time generated

content.query:
Event
| where Source contains "sysmon"
| where EventID == 17 or EventID == 18
| project TimeGenerated, EventID, Computer, UserName, Data=parse_xml(EventData).DataItem.EventData.Data
content.title: Raw events
